async function handleLog(request, env, origin) {
  const body = await request.json();
  const { conversation_id, role, content, has_image, metadata } = body;
  const now = new Date().toISOString();

  // Upsert conversation
  await env.DB.prepare(`
    INSERT INTO conversations (id, started_at, updated_at, metadata)
    VALUES (?1, ?2, ?2, ?3)
    ON CONFLICT(id) DO UPDATE SET updated_at = ?2
  `).bind(conversation_id, now, metadata ? JSON.stringify(metadata) : null).run();

  // Insert message
  await env.DB.prepare(`
    INSERT INTO messages (id, conversation_id, role, content, has_image, created_at)
    VALUES (?1, ?2, ?3, ?4, ?5, ?6)
  `).bind(crypto.randomUUID(), conversation_id, role, content, has_image ? 1 : 0, now).run();

  return corsResponse(jsonBody({ ok: true }), 200, origin);
}

// æ„é€ å‡½æ•°é‡Œæ–°å¢
this.conversationId = this.getOrCreateConversationId();

getOrCreateConversationId() {
    const stored = localStorage.getItem('polly_conv_id');
    if (stored) return stored;
    return this.resetConversationId();
}

resetConversationId() {
    const id = crypto.randomUUID();
    localStorage.setItem('polly_conv_id', id);
    return id;
}

2. æ¯æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€åï¼Œé™é»˜åŒæ­¥

syncMessage(role, content, hasImage = false) {
    try {
        const metadata = this.messages.length <= 1 ? {
            ua: navigator.userAgent.slice(0, 200),
            lang: navigator.language,
            ref: document.referrer.slice(0, 200),
        } : undefined;

        fetch(`${this.apiUrl}/v1/conversations/log`, {
            method: 'POST',
            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
            body: JSON.stringify({
                conversation_id: this.conversationId,
                role, content, has_image: hasImage, metadata,
            }),
        }).catch(() => {}); // é™é»˜å¤±è´¥
    } catch (e) {
        // é™é»˜
    }
}

class MemoryWriter:
    def append_to_daily(self, entry: MemoryEntry) -> Path:
        """è¿½åŠ åˆ°ä»Šæ—¥æ—¥å¿—"""
        daily_file = self.daily_dir / f"{date.today()}.md"
        
        # å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ–°æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå†™å…¥æ ‡é¢˜
        if not daily_file.exists():
            daily_file.write_text(f"# {date.today()} æ—¥å¿—\n\n")
        
        # è¿½åŠ è®°å¿†æ¡ç›®
        importance_stars = "â­" * entry.importance
        content = f"""
## {entry.timestamp.strftime('%H:%M')} {importance_stars} **{entry.title}**

{entry.content}

---
"""
        with daily_file.open("a") as f:
            f.write(content)
        
        return daily_file

class MemoryIndex:
    def __init__(self, db_path: Path):
        self.conn = sqlite3.connect(str(db_path))
        self.conn.execute("""
            CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS memory_index 
            USING fts5(
                id, title, content, tags, importance, date,
                tokenize='unicode61'
            )
        """)
    
    def search(self, query: str, limit: int = 10) -> List[IndexEntry]:
        # æ·»åŠ é€šé…ç¬¦æ”¯æŒå‰ç¼€åŒ¹é…
        fts_query = f"{query}*" if not query.endswith("*") else query
        
        cursor = self.conn.execute("""
            SELECT id, title, importance, date
            FROM memory_index
            WHERE memory_index MATCH ?
            ORDER BY rank
            LIMIT ?
        """, (fts_query, limit))
        
        return [IndexEntry(*row) for row in cursor.fetchall()]

// 1. è·å–å„é¢†åŸŸçš„ YAML æ–‡ä»¶åˆ—è¡¨
const categories = ['AI', 'DB', 'NW', 'SC', 'SE', 'DS', 'CT', 'CG', 'HI', 'MX'];

async function fetchCategoryConferences(category) {
    // é€šè¿‡ GitHub API è·å–ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰ YAML æ–‡ä»¶
    const apiUrl = `https://api.github.com/repos/ccfddl/ccf-deadlines/contents/conference/${category}`;
    const files = await fetch(apiUrl).then(r => r.json());
    
    // å¹¶è¡Œè·å–æ‰€æœ‰ YAML æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹
    const conferences = await Promise.all(
        files.filter(f => f.name.endsWith('.yml'))
             .map(f => fetchAndParseYaml(f.download_url))
    );
    return conferences.flat();
}

function parseDeadline(timeline, timezone) {
    // ä¼˜å…ˆä½¿ç”¨ abstract_deadlineï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰åˆ™ç”¨ deadline
    const deadlineStr = timeline.abstract_deadline || timeline.deadline;
    
    // å¤„ç†æ—¶åŒºï¼ˆå¦‚ UTC-12 è¡¨ç¤º AoE - Anywhere on Earthï¼‰
    const date = new Date(deadlineStr);
    if (timezone === 'UTC-12') {
        date.setHours(date.getHours() + 12); // è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæœ¬åœ°æ—¶é—´
    }
    return date;
}

const CACHE_KEY = 'cfp_conferences_cache';
const CACHE_DURATION = 6 * 60 * 60 * 1000; // 6 hours

function getCachedData() {
    const cached = localStorage.getItem(CACHE_KEY);
    if (cached) {
        const { data, timestamp } = JSON.parse(cached);
        if (Date.now() - timestamp < CACHE_DURATION) {
            return data;
        }
    }
    return null;
}

/* å¡ç‰‡ - ç®€çº¦è¾¹æ¡† + ç»†å·¦ä¾§æ¡ */
.cfp-card {

    border: 1px solid #e8e8ef;
    border-radius: 8px;
    position: relative;
}

.cfp-card::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 3px;
    background: #8b8ba7;
    border-radius: 3px 0 0 3px;
}

.countdown-value {

}

.urgency-critical .countdown-value { color: #dc3545; }
.urgency-warning .countdown-value { color: #fd7e14; }

.cfp-card-rank {
